dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to the land of Eridoria, a realm of ancient magic and forgotten lore.

dialogues.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogues.text: Greetings, traveler. I am Eryndor Thorne, a humble bard with a thirst for adventure.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: You have been summoned to the town of Willowdale, where rumors of a legendary artifact have drawn you and many others.

dialogues.speaker: Gorin Darkhaven
dialogues.text: Foolish adventurer! You think you can claim the artifact? I'll never let that happen.

dialogues.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogues.text: Ah, Gorin. Always quick to draw steel. But will it be enough to save you from your own darkness?
